crop_1.name: Maize (Corn)
crop_1.suitability_reason: Maize is adaptable to various climates and requires moderate rainfall. Grows well in temperature range of 15-35°C with well-drained soils.

chemical_pesticides.name: Atrazine 50% WP
chemical_pesticides.application: Apply 1-2 kg per hectare within 3 days of sowing

crop_2.name: Rice
crop_2.suitability_reason: Rice thrives in warm, humid conditions with abundant water supply. Ideal for areas with average temperature 20-35°C and high rainfall or irrigation.

organic_pesticides.name: Neem Oil
organic_pesticides.application: Spray 3-5ml per liter of water every 10-15 days
organic_pesticides.target: Brown planthopper, stem borer, blast disease

organic_pesticides.name: Bacillus thuringiensis (Bt)
organic_pesticides.application: Apply 1-2 kg per hectare during early larval stage

organic_pesticides.name: Trichoderma
organic_pesticides.application: Seed treatment 4-10g per kg of seed or soil application

chemical_pesticides.name: Carbofuran 3G
chemical_pesticides.application: Apply 33 kg per hectare at transplanting
chemical_pesticides.target: Stem borer, brown planthopper, whorl maggot

chemical_pesticides.name: Tricyclazole 75% WP
chemical_pesticides.application: Spray 0.6g per liter at boot leaf stage

chemical_pesticides.name: Pretilachlor 50% EC
chemical_pesticides.application: Apply 1-1.5 liter per hectare 3-5 days after transplanting
